text: Stephen P. Grand is an American geologist, currently the Carleton Professor of Geophysics at University of Texas at Austin. ==Education== *Ph.D. in Geophysics, Caltech, April, 1986 *BSc. in Physics, McGill University, 1978 CV ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Texas at Austin faculty Category:American geologists Category:McGill University alumni Category:California Institute of Technology alumni
